Key Match Events: Shadab Khan produced a special all-round effort with a 22-ball 52 and 2/16 bowling figures
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3/14 bowling figures
Shadab Khan reached his half-century in 20 balls
Tristan Stubbs and Heinrich Klaasen's partnership of 33 runs in 3.3 overs
Post-Match Reflections: With the win, Pakistan (4 points) moved up to the third spot in group 2
While South Africa (5 points) continued to stay second behind leaders India (6 points)
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was rain-curtailed and played under the DLS method
South Africa were set a revised target of 142 runs in 14 overs after the rain interruption
David Miller was ruled out due to an injury
